snippet: In an online appeal, the wife of Ayman al-Zawahri praised the role of Muslim women in the Arab Spring uprisings and urged them to raise their children "to love jihad and martyrdom."
abstract: In an online appeal, the wife of Ayman al-Zawahri praised the role of Muslim women in the Arab Spring uprisings and urged them to raise their children "to love jihad and martyrdom."

byline.original: By JENNIFER PRESTON and MONA EL NAGGAR

headline.main: Wife of Al Qaeda Leader Praises Muslim Women for Role in Uprisings
headline.print_headline: Wife of Al Qaeda’s Leader Praises Women for Role in Arab Spring
